example.name: non-agentive
example.text: In October , the busiest month of the year so far , daily volume averaged roughly 145 million shares .

example.text: On the civil side , the Manhattan prosecutor filed an average of only 11 cases for every 100,000 adults during the same period ; the San Francisco U.S. attorney averaged 79 .
